name: CarSelectorImages;CarSelectorImages-CAMERA
description: Makes Any Car the Reference Car
Makes Any Car the Reference Car and changes the Camera to focus on that car.
description-de: Mache ein Fahrzeug zum Referenz-Fzg und fokussiere die Kamera auf dieses Fzg.
description-es: Makes Any Car the Reference Car
Makes Any Car the Reference Car and changes the Camera to focus on that car.
